entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Internal CLR errors. #64884
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #64883
  • Cannot invoke `pthread_jit_write_protect_np` #64880
  • Difference in code quality: inline vs. local vector #64879
  • Constant propagation should preserve field sequences #64876
    Future
  • Suboptimal code generated with small-sized stackalloc #64873
  • Runtime error with system.text.json if a model includes action type for source generator #64871
  • NativeAOT Rd.xml file parsing should provide better reporting #64869
    Future
  • [Docker] The framework 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found. #64862

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: 64 bit Hashcode for objects #64870
  • [UWP] ILC.exe fails with "MSBUILD : error : Internal compiler error: Sequence contains no elements" #64801
  • JIT: Forward sub exposing missing containment safety checks in lower #64828
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate exception sets for assignments #64882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Normalize returns after optimizing returned indirs #64881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: clear lvMustInit from dependent locals #64877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump coverlet version #64875
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Improvements for SpanHelpers.IndexOf #64872
    area-System.Memory
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #64866
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete ReflectionModule::m_pCreatingAssembly and PEAssembly::m_creator #64865
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Implement LoadPairVector64 and LoadPairVector128 #64864
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix operator precedence consistency in ASCIIUtility.GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #64814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Mark promoted SIMD locals used by HWIs as DNER #64855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix link in readytorun-format.md #64878
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add support for `TYP_BYREF` `LCL_FLD`s to VN #64501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add an 'allow-loader-errors' AOT option. #64640
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: contained memory safety analysis fixes and improvements #64843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Allow missing assemblies in llvmonly+interp mode. #64294
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Another size estimate fix for `mov`s #64826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial roll out of !! #64720
    area-Meta
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove spin lock from SocketAsyncEventArgs on Windows #64770
    area-System.Net.Sockets, tenet-performance
  • Local heap optimizations on Arm64 #64481
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • For MultiRegStoreLoc prefer allocating a local def to the same register as src #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Turn off -ffp-contract on Unix #64847
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Streamline bool.TryParse/Format #64782
    area-System.Runtime

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing "No templates found matching:..."-message when using `-minimal` option with `dotnet new` #23782
  • `dotnet publish --no-build` over-publishes from referenced projects #23777

PullRequests

Created

  • Embed FSharp.Core.nuget package in dotnet SDK #23779
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Compound assignment in object initializer and `with` expression #5176
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Go to member doesn't work inside blazor .razor file #59326
    Backlog

Closed

  • Test for Source generators - attribute (ConstructorArguments) data is empty in unit tests (ok in actual execution) #59323
  • Suggest names for matching parameters from overloads #52534
    17.1
  • IDE0004 Unnecessary cast false positive #58804
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Produce better error for members in top-level main #59321
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • move Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Remote.ServiceHub.CoreComponents to net6.… #59324
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #59307
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • fix restore on nuget 6.2.0.33 #59230
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59320
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59319
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59318
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #59327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle more cases in both new line formatting and curly brace completion #53222
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS crashes on "Register" and "Log In" #40024
  • Blazor Prerendering for Static Web Apps #40023
  • So, how is this "silent OIDC login" supposed to work? #40022
  • Error when using custom HTTPS certificate from pem file #40020
  • Network Access by default for Web applications #40019

Closed

  • .Net 6 pass array in query string #40021
  • FileBufferingReadStream - CanRead and CanSeek should return !_disposed #39939
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Inconsistent Claim types between Token, Blazor and aspnet dotnet 6 #39991

PullRequests

Merged

  • FileBufferingReadStream - CanRead + CanSeek checks _disposed #40016
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Use `-noBuild` in second build steps of test jobs #39998
    area-infrastructure
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Fix Kestrel support for custom EndPoints #40003
    area-runtime
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SwipeView throws Java.Lang.IllegalStateException:'Layout state should be one of 100 but it is 10' when in RefreshView #4529
  • Add Web Plattform-Target (Like React Native Web) #4528

Closed

  • Proposal: Disable Microsoft.Extensions.Logging by default in Release builds #4394
  • Proposal: Remove Maui's Dependency on Extensions.Hosting #4393

PullRequests

Created

  • refactored Geocoding to an interface #4527
  • Add Shell to default template #4524

Merged

  • Flyout should always update the details when it changes. #4519
  • Remove MS.Extensions.Hosting from Maui #4505
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Refactor FlashLight to use an Interface #4525
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4518
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Refactor DeviceInfo to use an interface #4465
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-preview.14

Updated

  • Implement EvaluateJavaScriptAsync method in WebView #4435
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • If handler has a ViewController then return the View for the ViewController when calling ToPlatform #4523
    do-not-merge

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.TypeLoadException: 'Method 'AppendIdentityWhereCondition' in type 'SqlServerUpdateSqlGenerator' does not have an implementation. #27383
  • Globally disable the creation of foreign keys during migrations #27382

Closed

  • Filtering by enum values with CompareTo leads to SQL query translation error #27360

PullRequests

Updated

  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
    waiting-for-response
  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291
